outputs.output_descr: Guide the capacity development of local authorities on administrative and public expenditure and asset management skills (re-align MISR)

The primary function of this policy unit is the Reform & Align the Policy and Legal Framework for Local Authorities and to coordinate and guide the development and modification of the policy and legal environment for the LA system.
Restructure and Activate the Institutional Structures of Ministry of Local Development & Local Authority System.

The Coordination unit should function as an integrated unit maintaining a direct partnership and coordination between the three project outputs, and will ensure proper coordination with the existing High Committee for Decentralization.

project_descr: UNDP (supported by UNCDF's technical expertise) will provide technical support to enable the Ministry of  Local Development (MoLD) to activate its core functions and operate as the central entity to guide the decentralization reform and local governance.
project_title: Technical Support to MOLD in support to Local Developmen
